review: I have both the Fire TV and the Fire TV Stick.Take my advice...Spend a little more and get the regular Fire TV... You will be much happier with it.Fire TV Stick requires power source from either the TV's USB port or with the included AC adapter.Some TVs do not put out enough continuous juice on their USB ports to power the stick.The stick tends to buffer more often.Amazon did a great job with Fire TV (and the stick as well). Awesome product.
